Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.2 Akusalapada » 2.3.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
31.
1319Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1320Hetuvippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1321Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalañca hetuvippayuttaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1322Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā…  tīṇi. (3)
1323Hetuvippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1324Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalañca hetuvippayuttaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1325Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
32.
1326Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca…pe…  avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
